Preferred Tickets and Hospitality for the 2022 Singapore Grand Prix

Your 2022 Singapore Grand Prix travel package is yours to customize. You let us know what your ultimate race experience looks like and we’ll help you find the perfect viewing option. Choose from premium grandstand seating or upgrade to an exclusive hospitality venue. These luxe venues provide guests with a premium view of the race, gourmet food, champagne, and can include memorable experiences like pit tours and driver appearances.

The Singapore Grand Prix takes place on the Marina Bay Street Circuit in the heart of the city. The course is known for being incredibly challenging, with few opportunities for overtaking. As F1’s first night race, the Singapore Grand Prix offers a unique atmosphere with both thrilling race action and an impressive selection of entertainment.
